newsitem.title: USA: Orion Network Systems sets $710 mln debt.
newsitem.headline: Orion Network Systems sets $710 mln debt.

text.p: The following high-yield debt issue from Orion Network Systems Inc was priced on Tuesday, according to Orion Chief Financial Officer David Frear.
The proceeds will be used to pay off an existing bank loan and to fully fund the construction and launch of the company's next two satellites, Frear said.
The deal more than doubled in size from its initial filing and was more than two times oversubscribed, he added.
